name: Arif Hossain
about: Excellent knowledge on product design, technical field & management. Highly experienced on pattern making, product consumption analysis & development. Likes to share experience & new ideas to subordinate to develop their skill.

name: Mamunur Rashid
about: Excellent knowledge on product design, quality, technical field & management. Highly capable to innovate & develop new style align with trend & customer demand. Always ready to face any challenge with innovative & constructive ideas.

name: Salauddin Ahmed
about: Highly experienced on process development, planning, technical field & management. Excellent capability to plan every work from beginning to end with proper execution. Always ready with innovative & constructive ideas to ensure continuous process development
